```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
here::i_am("stars.Rproj")
library(here)
library(vroom)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
```

[Here](https://github.com/mbethlehem/stars.git) is the link to my Github repository.

```{r}
planets <- vroom(here("data", "planets.csv"), 
                          locale=locale(decimal_mark = ","))
```

The planets dataset contains `r planets |> nrow()` planets and cointains `r planets |> ncol()`, which coincides with the description of the datasets. 

```{r echo=FALSE}
valeur <- all(c(planets |> nrow(), planets |> ncol()) == c(851, 8))
```
```{r}
if(valeur){ 
  print("The planets dataset contains 851 planets and cointains 8, which coincides with the description of the dataset.")
}
if(!valeur){
  print("The planets dataset dimension does not coincide with the description of the dataset.")
} 
```
